name: MySMS Junk Hider
description: Does exactly that. Hides the 'Premium', 'Feedback', and 'Friends' buttons from the MySMS page.

user.name: luk3yx
user.about:
Please select 'Contact Us' on my webste (https://luk3yx.github.io) to get my E-Mail.
That way bots cannot get to it.

additional_info:
Adblock Plus & uBlock Origin filter:
    Add the following as a 3rd-party filter:
    https://gist.github.com/luk3yx/a38b549ca552c2ba89d579fe9df65894/raw
Changelog:
    Version 1.3:
        • Hides the "get premium to dial a call" menu item.
    Version 1.2:
        • Hides some menu items.
    Version 1.1:
        • Bugfixes
        • Now hides the 'Feedback' button.
    Version 1.0:
        • Initial release.
